member.name: M:NewHydrantApi.Controllers.UserPlays.GetUserPlays(System.Int32,Bleatingsheep.Osu.Mode,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: Mode to query. An integer from 0 to 3.
Query play records starting at this number.

member.name: M:NewHydrantApi.Controllers.UserSnapshotController.Get(System.Int32,Bleatingsheep.Osu.Mode)
member.summary: Get the snapshot of user info 24 hours ago.
member.returns: NotFound if the user has no snapshot data in the past 36 hours. If found, the snapshot taken closest to the moment 24 hours ago.
